title: How to Make Chocolate Mango Creams

steps.headline: Lay plastic wrap or tin foil out on your working space.
Put your preferred cup on your working space.
Fill it with halfway with mangoes.
Put whipped cream on it.
steps.description: Make sure you cover the mango entirely.

steps.headline: Shred your chocolate with a cheese grader or by hand.
Sprinkle the chocolate shreds on the cream.
Freeze for one hour, and serve!

text: Lay plastic wrap or tin foil out on your working space.  Put your preferred cup on your working space.  Chop up your mangoes. For best results, cube them. Fill it with halfway with mangoes.  Put whipped cream on it. Make sure you cover the mango entirely. Shred your chocolate with a cheese grader or by hand.  Sprinkle the chocolate shreds on the cream.  Freeze for one hour, and serve!  Finished.
